title: LiteBit
author: LiteBit
content: Looking to pick up a copy of Bitcoin: The Hunt For Satoshi Nakamoto comic book. Prefer English version but interested in any translation.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: I have a Spanish version - got it thinking it was English :/  if someone has a line on the English version, I would like to be in line behind LiteBit of course.

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: I’ve only got a Spanish version too!OP - I might be interested in parting with it. See how you get on finding the English version

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Now that is a comic I have not seen for many a year! I had a hard time finding one back in 2018...I can only imagine where they all went by now.Was lucky to pick the english and spanish version back then. Goodluck to ye all on your hunt!

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: You can still buy the Spanish version from Amazon here for about $30:https://www.amazon.com/Bitcoin-ALEX-PREUKSCHAT/dp/8415850565They do have Kindle versions of the English and Portuguese versions available also To my knowledge, there are 5 different language versions made:English, Spanish, Portuguese, Korean, and Russian!!!The Portuguese one was a little tough to get as was from Amazon Brazil, and to purchase something there you need to have a Brazilian citizen number.....

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.created_time: October 31, 2023, 01:20:59 PMLast edit: October 31, 2023, 02:00:37 PM by MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on October 31, 2023, 11:20:30 AMYou can still buy the Spanish version from Amazon here for about $30:https://www.amazon.com/Bitcoin-ALEX-PREUKSCHAT/dp/8415850565They do have Kindle versions of the English and Portuguese versions available also To my knowledge, there are 5 different language versions made:English, Spanish, Portuguese, Korean, and Russian!!!The Portuguese one was a little tough to get as was from Amazon Brazil, and to purchase something there you need to have a Brazilian citizen number.....you are correct - 5 versions. their original site still links to a dead page for the English version. I have the Spanish one at least but would love to find an English one so I can read it loledit: one sold for 20.4 BTC at an auction in 2015this one was also signed by quite a few early BitcoinersQuoteThe reason the comic is so special is that FinTech Compliance Executive, Juan Llanos, got the book signed by 105 Bitcoin movers and shakers from 10 different countries worldwide. The signatures include Jeff Garzik, Roger Ver, Vitalik Buterin, Andreas Antonopoulos, and many more making it truly one of a kind item.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on October 31, 2023, 11:20:30 AMYou can still buy the Spanish version from Amazon here for about $30:https://www.amazon.com/Bitcoin-ALEX-PREUKSCHAT/dp/8415850565They do have Kindle versions of the English and Portuguese versions available also To my knowledge, there are 5 different language versions made:English, Spanish, Portuguese, Korean, and Russian!!!The Portuguese one was a little tough to get as was from Amazon Brazil, and to purchase something there you need to have a Brazilian citizen number.....   Nice collection you got there....wasnt aware it came in all these languages....gotta keep en eye out for the ones I do not have!
